name: 2022 3rd Asia Service Sciences and Software Engineering Conference
content: ASSE 2022 information: 1\. ASSE 2022 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the ACM Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8745-3), which is indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus, etc. 3\. Prof. Sergei Gorlatch from University of Muenster, Germany and Prof. Chin-Chen Chang from Feng Chia University, Taiwan will attend the conference as Keynote Speakers.
